snippet.title: Shivering Hearts - Trailer
snippet.description:
Shivering Hearts is a role-playing game built on branching dialogue choices and multiple endings. Explore a unique fantasy setting illustrated with detailed hand-drawn watercolour characters and landscapes. Uncover what ills are plaguing the village of Shivering Hearts.

What  if you had the power to reshape reality but had no control over it? 

Is it worth extending empathy with someone who might not deserve it?

Are dreams a window to the soul or do we project meaning onto them? 

Will you ever get to eat that pie?

Check out the game at:
mishac.itch.io/shivering-hearts
shiveringhearts.com
instagram.com/shivering.hearts
